ISSUE.TITLE: Cert error after 'git push'
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I just set up a second project. When I do `git push` the github hook fires, and I get the following error in my drone log: `2014/11/25 19:48:28 http: TLS handshake error from 192.30.252.34:54931: remote error: unknown certificate authority` I don't receive the error on my other project when I push.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: empty codeowner gives issue in merge check (#730)
